trans-unit.source: Provides access and information for manipulating I/O streams within a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.CompressionOption"></xref> setting for the stream.

If <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601.Enumerator.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> has been called on the stream, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo.CompressionOption%2A> property returns CompressionOption.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.CompressionOption.NotCompressed>.
The compression option setting for the package stream.
Gets the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.EncryptionOption"></xref> setting for the stream.

If <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601.Enumerator.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> has been called on the stream, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo.EncryptionOption%2A> property returns EncryptionOption.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptionOption.None>.
The encryption option setting for the package stream.
Returns a stream opened in a default <xref href="System.IO.FileMode"></xref> and <xref href="System.IO.FileAccess"></xref>.

This <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo.GetStream%2A> method (without parameters), opens the stream in file mode <xref:System.IO.FileMode.OpenOrCreate> with the default storage root <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>.
The I/O stream opened in a default <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> root <xref href="System.IO.FileMode"></xref> and <xref href="System.IO.FileAccess"></xref>..
Returns an I/O stream opened in a specified <xref href="System.IO.FileMode"></xref>.
This <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo.GetStream%2A> method opens the stream with the default storage root <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>.
The file mode in which to open the stream.
The stream opened in the specified file mode.
Returns an I/O stream opened in a specified <xref href="System.IO.FileMode"></xref> and with a given <xref href="System.IO.FileAccess"></xref>.
The file mode in which to open the stream.
The file access mode in which to read or write to the stream.
The I/O stream opened in the specified <xref href="System.IO.FileMode"></xref> and with a given <xref href="System.IO.FileAccess"></xref>.
Gets the name of the stream.

If <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601.Enumerator.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> has been called on the stream, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo.Name%2A> property returns an empty string.
The name of this stream.
